title.value: Кормовая продуктивность сои в зависимости от применения удобрений на дерново-подзолистой супесчаной почве
Feed productivity of soybean depending on a fertilizer application on sod-podzolic sandy loam soil
Feed productivity of soybean depending on a fertilizer application on sod-podzolic sandy loam soil

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Bosak, V.N., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Skorina, V.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Koloskova, T.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). The Scientific and Practical Center for Bioresources

abstract.value: Soybean (Glycine max) is a wide-spread cultivar used for food, technical and feed purposes and appears one of the most important protein-and-oil plants in the world. The most intensive use of soybean itself along with byproducts (oilseed meal, green mass, silo) fall to the share of animal feeding. For evaluation of fodder quality different indexes are used among them are feeding units, feed-and-protein units, digestible protein etc. The main goal of the research is to evaluate the influence of mineral fertilizers on feed productivity of soy depending on variety's peculiarities on sod-podzolic loamy sandy soil. During the research the application of mineral fertilizers in the process of cultivation of soy beans on the sod-podzolic loamy sandy soil the cultivar has provided high indicators of fodder productivity of green mass and grain with the best indicators of productivity in the variant with the application of N70P40K90 in pre-sowing cultivation.
